qoute: How is the world ruled and led to war? Diplomats lie to journalists and believe these lies when they see them in print.
It is inexcusable for scientists to torture animals; let them make their experiments on journalists and politicians.
Journalists are like dogs, when ever anything moves they begin to bark.
Journalists do not live by words alone, although sometimes they have to eat them.
How is the world ruled and led to war? Diplomats lie to journalists and believe these lies when they see them in print.
It is inexcusable for scientists to torture animals; let them make their experiments on journalists and politicians.
Journalists are like dogs, when ever anything moves they begin to bark.
Journalists do not live by words alone, although sometimes they have to eat them.
We have to protect all journalists, and journalists have to be allowed to do their jobs.
